title: Honestly
lyrics:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I suck, I suck
Yeah you do!
Tomorrow seems to seep into the edge of nothing (a blueish tinted, faded vision, hey!)
Aimless eyes are searching for a better something (but it’s okay, it’s indecision)

Pockets full of lilacs that I picked, so pointless (the violet scented, clouded vision)

Creeping up, the feelings that it’s all for nothing (it’s okay, it’s indecision)



Honestly it's

Hard to know what you’re thinking

Got to give up

It's no fun when you're leaving



It's okay, it's okay, it's okay, but repetitive

Uncertainty, we chase ghosts, indifferent



Honestly, it’s

Hard to know what you’re thinking

Got to give up

It's no fun when you're leaving
